name: Girls' breath holding competition (beta)
description:
Girls' breath holding competition is a simple simulation game. You have to help and train the girl to win the competition. In the process, you can watch her struggle to hold her breath longer through physics simulation. Train and grow her stats to win every competition!

Please note: This is a beta game. There are so many bugs and errors, and I will continue to fix them. If you find any bugs please tell me!
